column2: I cannot get on the local train. My boyfriend and I both gave our meals and thumb down and I usually love places like this! My Bahn Mi was awful. So much sauce that it was inedible. I left it for the trash. My boyfriend ordered the chicken sandwich on the pretzel bun. While the presentation was again gorgeous
column3: the taste left something to be desired. The kale was over dressed and the quinoa tasted like the juice in the can of a black beans.
